item.title: CVE-2021-3633|2024-08-03T17:01:07.381Z -- lenovo -- driver%20management
item.description: A DLL preloading vulnerability was reported in Lenovo Driver Management prior to version 2.9.0719.1104 that could allow privilege escalation.
